'''Character Notes''' are posts by [[miHoYo]] sharing information on [[Character]]s with a returning [[Event Wish]] on [[HoYoLAB]], Twitter, Facebook, and Reddit. Information in the posts include their party role, skills, [[Artifact]] recommendations, [[Weapon]] recommendations, and their background.
